scripts.build: npm run css-compile && npm run js-compile
scripts.js-compile: cd .\assets\js\ && npx terser ..\dev\js\main.js ..\dev\js\navbar.js ..\dev\js\gallery.js --compress --mangle reserved=['css'] --toplevel --source-map url='app.js.map' --output app.js

author: Loh Ka Hong
